title: Game-Based Learning Program for Understanding Bioaccumulation and Biomagnification

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Program to Strengthen Social Responsibility and Sustainability Competencies for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the mechanisms of bioaccumulation and biomagnification through game simulations.
Learners can apply the analogical teaching method to analyze the movement of pollutants using real-life examples (e.g., heavy metal contamination).
Learners can generate conceptual models (e.g., food chain diagrams) of bioaccumulation phenomena during post-game discussions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
